author: Thich Nhat Hanh
message: If we are not fully ourselves, truly in the present moment, we miss everything.
title: Thought of the day

author: Aesop
message: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
title: Thought of the day

author: Channing
message: Every man is a volume if you know how to read him.
title: Thought of the day

message: The difficulties of life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
title: Thought of the day
